attributes.action: Remove Charles Darwin from being considered a respected individual.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1.  Remove the picture of the extremely racist Charles Darwin from the £10 note AND
2. If this country is not a racist country, let us rid ourselves of the religious (firmly held belief) filth of Darwins teachings!  Do not teach his arrogant and UNSCIENTIFIC theology (his god was himself) in our schools and misname it as "science."  
If we teach Evolution, we should teach other (and more plauseable possibilities - i.e. Intelligen Design) beliefs.  

Let us not forget that "race" is a made-up concept anyway.  We should run away at full speed from any thing that has encouraged the actions of Adolf Hitler!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
